Name: Roll Around
Description: Deal 1 damage. If the Bear is awake, deal 1 damage to each enemy instead.

Name: Mark Territory
Description:
Rotate up to two cards on your field.
Draw a card.

Name: Bear Claw
Description: Deal 2 damage. If the Bear is awake, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Resounding Roar
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 3 damage to each enemy.
Otherwise, remove 5 ⏳ and forage.
